title: DigiDeeds
description: On going project to build a blockchain based real estate trading platform.
longDescription: The web application for the blockchain-based real estate trading platform is designed to provide a user-friendly interface for managing real estate transactions on a blockchain. The application seamlessly integrates with the blockchain to offer functionalities such as registering properties, performing transactions, and ensuring transparency and security throughout the process. This project also contains a separate blockchain application we created using C++.
functionalities: Property Transactions (Buying and Selling, Fractional Ownership)

title: Logic Gate circuit Simulation Software
description: Software application that allows to simulate logic gate circuits graphically.
longDescription: This is a software solution to simulate logic gate circuit graphically. It allows the user to draw logic gate circuits on the given GUI, and the application genarates the final output of the circuit. The application is developed using C++ and python. The Graph data structure is used to store the circuit (Graph adjencylist). The GUI is created using a python library named pygame which is commonly used for developing 2D games. This is a project I developed in my second year.
functionalities: Before designing complicated circuits physically, a study and simulations can be done
The outputs for specific inputs can be taken easily

title: License Plate detection System
description: A system designed using the image processing techniques to detect vehicle license plates.
longDescription: The proposed project addresses the challenge of manually identifying vehicle license plates from a video footage. Since, the manual process is inefficient, exposed to human errors, and difficult to scale for large datasets or real-time applications, an innovative solution is needed to address these limitations. Since, we propose an automatic license plate detection and extraction application. YOLO, a state-of-the-art deep learning model, is widely used for object detection. YOLO can accurately identify them in videos despite variations in lighting, angles, and plate styles, when trained on a comprehensive dataset of license plates. Meanwhile, OpenCV, a versatile computer vision library, facilitates real-time video processing and visualization.
functionalities: Extract characters: Implement Optical Character Recognition (OCR) techniques to extract the actual characters from the detected license plates.

title: Social App
description: This is a Social Media application like facebook.
longDescription: A social media application using React and Node.js with MongoDB as the database. The final application allows users to create posts, upload images, follow other users, and view their profiles. some of the concepts used in this project are React Hooks, Context API, and Axios.

title: Quizz App API
description: API designed for organizing and managing quizes.
longDescription: API designed for organizing and managing quizes.
